books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The line between fact and fiction becomes blurred when an author of thrillers is found dead after a hurricane hits Camino Island.
books.name: CAMINO WINDS

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by Sally Rooney
books.description: The connection between a high school star athlete and a loner ebbs and flows when they go to Trinity College in Dublin.
books.name: NORMAL PEOPLE

books.author: by Jennifer Weiner
books.description: Daphne Berg’s former best friend asks her to be the maid of honor at her wedding in Cape Cod.
books.name: BIG SUMMER

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Four novellas: “Mr. Harrigan’s Phone,” “The Life of Chuck,” “Rat” and “If It Bleeds.”
books.name: IF IT BLEEDS

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The sixth book in the Memory Man series. Decker and Jamison investigate a murder in a North Dakota town in a fracking boom.
books.name: WALK THE WIRE

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: The 20th book in the Women’s Murder Club series. Lindsay Boxer looks into the murders of disreputable persons in three separate cities.
books.name: THE 20TH VICTIM

books.author: by Mary Alice Monroe
books.description: As her second wedding approaches, a woman returns to Charleston, S.C., where her family is dealing with changes.
books.name: ON OCEAN BOULEVARD

books.author: by Jeanine Cummins
books.description: A bookseller flees Mexico for the United States with her son while pursued by the head of a drug cartel.
books.name: AMERICAN DIRT

books.author: by Scott Turow
books.description: An 85-year-old defense lawyer puts off his retirement to aid a Nobel Prize winner in Medicine, who is accused of insider trading, fraud and murder.
books.name: THE LAST TRIAL

books.author: by Emily Henry
books.description: A relationship develops between a literary fiction author and a romance novelist as they both try to overcome writer’s block.
books.name: BEACH READ

books.author: by Curtis Sittenfeld
books.description: An imaginative look at the life and career one woman might have had if she had not married Bill Clinton.
books.name: RODHAM

books.author: by Emma Straub
books.description: A repressed memory triggers Astrid Strick to weigh the outcomes of her parenting of her now-grown children.
books.name: ALL ADULTS HERE

books.author: by Barbara Delinsky
books.description: After 20 years away, Mallory Aldiss returns to her family's Rhode Island beach home.
books.name: A WEEK AT THE SHORE
